Indian Economy.title: CPI inflation rises to 0.71% in November, food inflation below zero for 6th straight month
Indian Economy.summary: Core CPI inflation was broadly steady at 4.4% in November, primarily due to gold and silver inflation hitting new all-time highs.

Indian Economy.title: India’s retail inflation rises to 0.71% in November
Indian Economy.summary: India's annual retail inflation accelerated to 0.71% in November from a record low of 0.25% in October, government data showed on Friday.

Indian Economy.title: Welfare measures and distributed growth behind Tamil Nadu’s economic growth, says Industries Min TRB Rajaa

Indian Economy.title: From ‘taper tantrums’ to ‘Trump tantrums’—the Indian rupee faces a new reckoning
